    <metadata>

      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">

          <title>
            <string language="fr">Voir et entendre des choses</string>
            <string language="en">Seeing and hearing things</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Sehen und Hörensachen</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Vendo e coisas da audição</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Vedendo e cose sentirsi</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Να δει και ακοής πράγματα</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Viendo y cosas el oír</string>
          </title>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <description>
            <string language="fr">Cette illustration prouve que nous pouvons voir des choses parce que la lumière entre dans nos yeux et nous pouvons  entendre des choses parce que le bruit entre dans nos oreilles.</string>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows that we can see things because light enters our eyes and we can hear things because sound enters our ears.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">oreille</string>
            <string language="en">ear</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">oeil</string>
            <string language="en">eye</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">audition</string>
            <string language="en">Hearing</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">lumière</string>
            <string language="en">Light</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">réflexion</string>
            <string language="en">reflection</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">sens</string>
            <string language="en">senses</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">vue</string>
            <string language="en">sight</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">bruit</string>
            <string language="en">sound</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt, daß wir Sachen sehen 
können, weil Licht unsere Augen kommt und wir Sachen hören können, 
weil Ton unsere Ohren kommt.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra que nós podemos ver 
coisas porque a luz entra em nossos olhos e nós podemos ouvir coisas 
porque o som entra em nossas orelhas.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione indica che possiamo vedere 
le cose perché la luce entra nei nostri occhi e possiamo sentire le 
cose perché il suono entra nei nostri orecchi.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση δείχνει ότι μπορούμε να 
δούμε τα πράγματα επειδή το φως εισάγει τα μάτια μας 
και μπορούμε να ακούσουμε τα πράγματα επειδή ο ήχος εισάγει τα 
αυτιά μας.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra que podemos ver cosas 
porque la luz entra en nuestros ojos y podemos oír cosas porque el 
sonido entra en nuestros oídos.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Ohr</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Auge</string>
          </keyword>
